entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 23.
